MRealWorkExp.desc: While doing this data science course, you will get the opportunity to work with a tech company on their live data science project. For which you will receive project experience letter directly from that tech- company. Now when you go for interview recruiters won’t treat you as a fresher in Data science which in turn will help you to get your dream job.

Benefits.heading: Start with Skillslash
Benefits.desc: Our Data Science course is mentored by highly experienced professionals from top-tier business firms. You can customize the Data Science course as per your preference of study - for beginners and professionals.
Benefits.InterviewD: Gain industry-valued certifications for your live projects with a course completion certificate

Certificate.desc: Enrolling in the best data science course with job assistance allows you to work on real-world industry projects while also receiving a certification. We help you acquire practical technical skills.

RealWork.subtitle: What makes Skillslash stand out?
RealWork.desc: With a project-based learning technique, Skillslash strives to provide the Data Science course - with industry-specific requirements and demands. Also, building relevant knowledge and experience in the Data Science course will help you stand unique concerning industry standards.

syllabusDesc: This program will cover all concepts of data science from basic to advance through live-interactive classes. Get a chance to learn data science concepts in your current professional domain like Banking, IT, Mechanical, manufacturing, HR, sales, marketing and many more as a part of Domain Specialisation. From enrolment till placement you will be under the guidance of Trainers & Mentors who all are working as Sr. Data Scientist in top MNCs

Review.title: Why get enrolled in our Data Science?
Review.desc: Skillslash’s Data Science course with real-work experience is designed for creative minds and made for everyone. Take our data science training and experience the new era of education.

Fee.desc: Skillslash offers Data Science course, starting at INR 59,999 (without GST). We aim to provide the relevant course qualification with high-quality education attaining career growth
Fee.ProDesc: Learn data science from industry experts
Fee.ProMaxDesc: Learn data science with real work experience

AboutCourseHeading.heading: Why is the Data Science course in Bangalore popular?
AboutCourseHeading.para: Being a rapidly growing field, Data Science has impacted nearly every industry. Since large amounts of data are being collected, processed, and analyzed, the demand for Data Science professionals has been increasing enormously. Furthermore, the combination of statistics and probability with the mathematical data for technical analysis in order to extract data insights. This requires a set of skilled professionals to be on board with adequate technological knowledge, decision-making, and programming skills. Get a certification to be a significant candidate.

FAQ.desc: Check out the FAQs on Skillslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore for better clarity on the program features, fees, lectures, and much more to a successful career ahead.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the various learning options offered under the Advanced Data science course in Bangalore?
FaqDATA.ans: Our Data science course in Bangalore provides both offline and online learning options, enabling learners to gain practical work experience. We also provide a blended learning course with a job assistance program. Additionally, you are advised to participate in real-time, online classes that use a hybrid learning approach.  Because of the pandemic situation, our Data Science course in Bangalore can only provide fully online through live interactive sessions. This helps you in such a way that you can interact with your instructor in real time, just as you would in a conventional face-to-face session. Nowadays, gaining an advanced certification in Data Science and AI is highly beneficial for career progression. For reference, Our Data Science course in Bangalore has its course pricing starting at INR 59,999 excluding GST. If you have any further queries regarding the course syllabus or the course fee, don’t hesitate to call us to get clarification.

FaqDATA.ques: Will a make-up class be available if I miss a session due to an emergency?
FaqDATA.ans: Through live online sessions, Skillslash provides a Data Science course in Bangalore with a placement assistance program. Our learners are given access to recorded lectures and courses. We also provide you unrestricted access to these recordings so you may check them anytime whenever you need some theoretical support for your studies. You can also attend the next live session without worrying if you miss any of the classes. We don’t demand any additional fee than the mentioned fees for the Data Science course in Bangalore. However, we advise you to attend all of the live lectures possible.

FaqDATA.ques: Is class repetition possible in Skilslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore?
FaqDATA.ans: If you don't fully understand a concept in any of our classes, Skillslash gives you the chance to attend the upcoming classes on the Data Science course in Bangalore. This takes away the chance of misunderstanding or confusion that occurs in learning courses. If you get confused by any case in our course syllabus, connect with our experienced tutors throughout the program with no additional charges on Skillslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore.

FaqDATA.ques: What does Skillslash’s scholarship program for the Advanced Data Science course in Bangalore provide?
FaqDATA.ans: The scholarship program is applicable not only for Skillslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore but also for other courses. Each applicant must pass a 20-minute online aptitude test as part of the scholarship program offered by Skillslash. If you score with a grade of at least 65%, you will receive a 10% discount on Skillslash’s course fees for the Data Science course in Bangalore. Candidates who lost their employment as a result of the COVID crisis and moms who wish to start their careers after a break may also be eligible for up to a 100% scholarship, according to the exam results, for this advanced data science and AI certification course.

FaqDATA.ques: Are there any course fee discounts available with Skillslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore?
FaqDATA.ans: If you pass the online exam to qualify for the scholarship, you will receive a discount of up to 10% on the course fees of Skillslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore and also for the AI and ML courses. Additionally, we offer scholarships to COVID applicants, unemployed people, and women returning to the profession after maternity leave. With no further delay, get enrolled in Skillslash through scholarships at our Data Science course in Bangalore.

FaqDATA.ques: What certification does the Data Science course in Bangalore provide?
FaqDATA.ans: You won't only obtain a standard certification or academic degree if you enroll in Skillslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore. Instead, we provide a globally recognized project management qualification. Direct certificates for projects from the firms are also advantageous, therefore we provide certification from the businesses you worked with on your industrial project. If you have any doubts regarding the course, reach out to our counselors for better clarification on the Data Science course in Bangalore.

Yes, Skillslash provides a complete refund for all of its courses including the Data Science course in Bangalore with respect to the terms and conditions. Also, we have no-cost EMI procedures for a maximum of 12 months duration. Yet, refund policies are considered until 15 days after the start date of Skillslash’s Data Science course in Bangalore.
